title: Sprunki PopIt
description: Sprunki PopIt: The Ultimate Bubble-Popping Adventure! Get ready for hours of bubbly fun with Sprunki PopIt, the free-to-play online game that kids everywhere are going crazy for! It’s fast, colorful, and packed with exciting challenges. Your goal? Pop all the bubbles, dodge obstacles, and conquer level after level of pure popping chaos!
instructions: Mouse to play.

title: Monster Merge Legends Alive
description: Merge monsters! Choose more points! Drop monsters into the playing area. If they match, they will merge and become monsters of a higher rank. Your task is to unite as many monsters as possible and accumulate as many points as possible!
instructions: Press and hold your finger or mouse button within the playing area to select the monster's fall trajectory. Release your finger or mouse button and the monster will fall onto the playing field! It will be easy to connect monsters at first, but with each new one the playing field will fill up. Drop identical monsters on top of each other. When the highest-ranking monster connects, it will disappear and you will get more points.

title: Vault Breaker
description: Can you help our furry thief crack open a vault harbouring a hidden secret? Click when the marker crosses the button and unlock the vault now.
instructions: Step into the paws of a cunning little raccoon in a thrilling arcade game that combines quick reflexes with a love for shiny treasures! The objective is simple: watch for a red marker that moves arround the vault door and click precisely when it crosses the gold button. Each level requires you to click a number of times equal to the level you’re on. Every successful click gets you closer to claiming the vault’s riches! Remember, timing is everything!

title: Holiday Hex Sort
description: In Holiday Hex Sort, drag and drop hex tile stacks onto the board. Merge tiles to form stacks of 10 and collect them. As levels progress, more tile types appear. If there are 10 similar tiles on a stack, they will be collected. Clear all tiles by making stacks of 10 before time runs out !
instructions: Use your mouse or touchpad to drag and drop hex tile stacks onto the board. Merge tiles to create stacks of 10 and clear them. Complete the board before time runs out!

title: Puzzle Wood Block
description: Put the given blocks of pattern in 9x9 squares to fill them. Once the 9x9 slots are all Filled up, the blocks in it will be cleared! Achieve high score by clearing many combos at once!
instructions: As you start the game, you will see nine 3x3 slot boards and three different patterned blocks on the bottom. If you fill vertical or horizontal 9 slots with given blocks, or fill 3x3 slots, you gain points. When there is no more space to fill with given blocks, the game stops and you get final records.

title: Stickman Troll Thief Puzzle
description: Thief Puzzle is a funny and addictive casual puzzle game. Here you should help a clever stickman with many funny ways to solve puzzles and steal target items. The rich and varied game scene contains many unexpected obstacles and traps, testing your intelligence and logical thinking. Each level of the game is a unique challenge. To make flexible movements of the character to overcome obstacles, avoid enemies, and successfully steal the target item.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Christmas sorting
description: Christmas Sorting is a relaxing game for all ages. Place objects next to each other to collect 3 identical objects in a row. Collect all the unique decorations for a Christmas atmosphere. Create Christmas coziness, decorate the Christmas tree the way you want.
instructions: Place objects along the portals, connect three identical objects in a row to make them disappear. To complete the level, you must clear all portals of objects. As you earn points, you can unlock more different avatars, portals, and backgrounds. Use a magic wand to remove paired items. Use a magnifying glass to highlight identical objects. As you complete levels, get Christmas tree decorations, decorate the Christmas tree and watch how other players do it.

title: Sprunki Challenge
description: Sprunki Challenge game adds a challenge mode to the famous Sprunki game and activates the game's battle mode. While the 1 Player mode of the game includes the classic mode, in the 2 Player mode you both make music using Sprunki characters and try to reach 2000 by generating scores. You can play the game with your friend in both dark mode and normal mode. If you want, you can also activate different backgrounds.
instructions: Use the "LEFT-MOUSE" button to interact with objects. You can use touch controls on mobile devices.

title: Wonders of Egypt Mahjong
description: Wonders of Egypt Mahjong transports you to the mystical world of Ancient Egypt in this brand-new Solitaire Mahjong game. Play through beautifully designed hand-drawn tiles featuring Egyptian motifs and captivating backgrounds inspired by the wonders of Egypt. With 40 unique new layouts and three smaller tutorial layouts, it’s perfect for both beginners and Mahjong experts. Dive into hours of challenging gameplay and uncover the secrets of the Pharaohs!
instructions: Find and match identical tiles, making sure they’re free on at least one side to remove them from the board. Clear all tiles to complete each layout and unveil the mysteries of Egypt! Use Shuffle, Torch, or Hint if you’re stuck, and earn stars as you progress through endless puzzles. Relax and enjoy the beauty of Ancient Egypt in this captivating Solitaire Mahjong journey!

title: Gun Racing
description: Here you cannot just race with other cars, but destroy them with the help of numerous weapons. Improve your riding skills and take first places in tournaments!
instructions: Pass the skill test levels and unlock new content! For completing a level you are given money and tickets, for which you can buy and improve weapons and cars. For completing the grand tournament and timed battles, increased rewards are given out! Also, for completing the game, experience is awarded, which unlocks bonuses in the seasons. For 25 experience levels you are guaranteed to get a new car!

title: Word Mine
description: Word Mine takes you on a thrilling journey where letters are your treasure! Dive into a world of scrambled chaos and uncover hidden words buried in the grid. With every move, you’ll strike gold, revealing secrets that push you closer to victory. Sharpen your mind, follow the clues, and let the adventure unfold—one word at a time!
instructions: 1.Rearrange Letters: Drag and drop the scrambled letters on the grid to form meaningful words. 2.Follow Color Hints: Green Tile: The letter is in the correct position. Yellow Tile: The letter is in the correct row or column but not the exact spot. White Tile: The letter is in the wrong position entirely. 3. Find All Words: Each level has a set of valid words hidden in the grid. 4. Unlock New Levels: Progress through increasingly challenging puzzles, with more complex grids.

title: Flick 'n Bounce
description: Tap to bounce enemies, use powerful props, and survive in this fast-paced stickman battle! Don't let enemies get close—bounce them all away and master the chaos! Ready for the challenge?
instructions: Wait for the appropriate moment to flick enemies PC: Use mouse to do actions Mobile: Swipe on screen to do actions

title: Burger Cafe - Cooking Games For Kids
description: Learn to cook burgers and open your own restaurant! Choose a recipe, gather fresh ingredients, chop veggies, prepare signature sauces, bake buns to perfection, and fry juicy patties. Once everything’s ready, assemble your burger masterpiece, package it, and serve happy customers. Customize your restaurant’s look and unlock new recipes as you rise to become a top chef in town. Dive into the burger-making experience and build the best burger joint around!
instructions: Use the left mouse button on the desktop and tapping the screen on the phone. Follow the prompts to make burger!

title: Christmas Find The Differences
description: Get into the festive spirit with Christmas Find The Differences, the ultimate holiday-themed puzzle game! Test your observation skills as you compare two seemingly identical pictures filled with Christmas cheer. Spot all the differences in magical settings featuring Christmas trees, snowy landscapes, stockings, and Santa himself!
instructions: Mouse Click

title: Data Diggers
description: Merge USBs, choose blocks, download data, get money,and buy USBs Merge the USBs for increased efficiency. Dig Data in Data Diggers, actually you rather download Data with your USBs. The higher the GB amount of your USB, the faster you can download the data.
instructions: Left mouse button to interact with in game UI Drag the left mouse button to merge USB WS or up/down arrow keys to move camera Scroll to zoom

title: Blocks Breaker
description: Shoot Blocks break Blocks, upgrade your the tiny car to make it shoot faster to break more blocks!!! Get coins with every block you break!
instructions: WASD or Mouse to move

title: Christmas Merge
description: The winter season has returned, and the North Pole is bustling with excitement! Get ready for festive fun with Christmas Merge! The elves are in a frenzy, scrambling to match presents in time—merge them quickly before the frost sets in! How many Santas can you create in one go? Play now, and let's find out!
instructions: Tap and drag to aim where you want to drop a piece. Merge the pieces to create a different, bigger piece. The goal is to obtain as high of a score as possible.

title: Girlfriend from Hell
description: Girlfriend From Hell is an addictive and fun 2D arcade puzzle game. The main goal of the game is the girl's revenge on her lover. The heroine needs to find objects and use them to make her boyfriend's life hell. You need to collect various items to make a trap with them.
instructions: Controls on desktop: WASD for camera, Left mouse button for interaction. Control on a mobile device: touch / swipe.

title: My Perfect Mine
description: Become the leader of the Mining Empire! You are the head of the mining business. There are several workers under your leadership. Send them to the mine to extract a valuable resource - gold. But not everything is as monotonous as you might think!
instructions: The goal of the game is to hire workers, upgrade them, build buildings, create a huge underground city. Control - left mouse button / swipe

title: 100 Hidden Capybaras
description: Are you ready for a hidden object game that's as cute as it is challenging? Jump into "100 Hidden Capybaras" – the ultimate hidden object adventure where your mission is to find and collect 100 adorable capybaras, each hiding in beautifully designed scenes! Explore stunning environments filled with lush forests, charming villages, secret dungeons, and unknown planets. Discover all hiding spots for our fluffy friends as you put your observation skills to the test.
instructions: In the black and white picture provided, find the capybara that is displayed in the upper right corner of the screen. Click on its location, then look for the next one. Enjoy vibrant graphics, and a delightful soundtrack that will keep you engaged throughout your journey.

title: Connect Balls New Year Puzzles!
description: ● This New Year's game is more difficult than it might seem ?! You have a playing field? on which you need to throw balls and connect the same ones??! Until you get the biggest and most beautiful one?! Save up points?! Compete with friends and colleagues to become the best?! Enjoy your game?!
instructions: 1. At first it will be easy to connect the balls?, but over time there will be more and more of them??. As soon as you connect the most beautiful ball in this game, it will disappear? and give you the most points?! If one of the lines is filled with balls ?, the game will start again ?! 2. Press and hold your finger or mouse to control the ball?. Release your finger or mouse button to let the ball? fall onto the field?! 3. Enjoy the game?!

title: Block Puzzle - Frozen Jewel
description: An addictive block puzzle game that helps train your eyes and brain. It is a combination between the Tetris and Jewels game styles.
instructions: Drag the jewel blocks to the desired places, to form full jewel lines (horizontal or vertical) in order to blast them.

title: Plane Crash Ragdoll Simulator
description: As a fearless pilot, your mission is simple: survive a relentless onslaught of rockets targeting your aircraft. Take the controls of a variety of planes and helicopters, each with unique skins to unlock and customize. Your goal is to navigate through perilous skies and bring your aircraft to the ground without crashing. But be warned: if you touch the ground, your aircraft will be exploded!
instructions: Aircraft Gas = Press the Joystick Aircraft Control = Move the Joystick

title: Ice Cream Fever Cooking Game
description: In this frozen treat game, embark on a delightful journey through a world of creamy concoctions, toppings, and the most scrumptious sundaes you've ever dreamed of. If you're a fan of cooking games and have a soft spot for delectable desserts, "Ice Cream Fever" is the game you've been craving!
instructions: How to play the Ice Cream Fever Cooking Games :- -Only finger tapping need! Chef easy to play and win trucks! -Needed kitchen item upgrade and start cooking and serve food dishes to customer. -Hey Chefs, Why are you waiting for it? Play now!

title: Construction Truck: Building Games for Kids
description: A vibrant and engaging construction game where kids can build houses, drive vehicles, and explore a world of fun activities. With easy-to-follow instructions, children learn new words, develop skills, and enjoy creative play in a safe, interactive environment.
instructions: Use the mouse or tap the screen and follow the hints.

title: 321 Choose the Different
description: In this exciting casual puzzle game, you'll have less than 3 seconds to find the different figure among several options - the faster you find it, the more points you'll collect! Key features: Fast Mode: Find the different figure in record time. Relax Mode: Enjoy a calm and relaxing game, no pressure. Extreme Mode: Test your skills with a real challenge. 321 Choose the Different is the perfect game to improve your observation skills and pass the time in a fun way.
instructions: Select the different figure before the countdown ends. You can use the mouse or the touch screen.

title: Unicorn Find The Differences
description: Unicorn Find The Differences is a magical spot-the-difference game designed to test your observation skills and bring a bit of fantasy into your day! Each level offers beautifully crafted images with subtle differences that make every game exciting and engaging. Perfect for both kids and adults, this game is a delightful way to relax, challenge your attention to detail, and enjoy charming unicorn illustrations. See if you can spot all the differences and reach the next level of mythical fun!
instructions: Mouse Tap

title: Sorting Candy Factory
description: A great puzzle game in the sorting genre. At the candy factory, all the candies are mixed up, sort the candies into flasks so that they can be packed and shipped according to orders. The game has many levels with increasing difficulty!
instructions: The control is carried out with a single click. For mobile devices - tapping with your finger. for personal computers, click the left mouse button.

title: Sprunki
description: Sprunki Challenge is a fun and character interactive music game where you can develop your rhythm skills. Mix rhythms, sounds and characters to create completely original tracks with instantly interacting characters. Drag-and-drop game mechanics allow for an unlimited number of combinations. This way, you will never get bored and create new rhythms and music every time you play. For the horror theme, you can drag the black button onto the character.
instructions: Use the "LEFT-MOUSE" button to interact with objects or touch controls.

title: Swipetown
description: Swipe to combine tiles and build your own fantasy town in this addictive 2048 puzzler! Merge buildings into new ones and create your own village paradise. When the board fills up, you’re done!
instructions: Swipe to move all tiles. When two identical tiles combine, they merge into one. When the board fills up, it’s game over.

title: Mutant Assassin 3D
description: In the action-packed game “Mutant Assassin 3D,” you become a skilled special agent. Armed with web-launching abilities, you take on bad guys across diverse terrains. Your mission: eliminate all foes by ensnaring them with your webs and delivering powerful punches. As you progress through 4 levels, prepare for the ultimate challenge: the boss level. No hints here—navigate the best route to victory on your own. Good luck!
instructions: Hold and swipe the screen = aim

title: Lunar Phase Battle
description: Play Lunar Phase Battle, a simple turn-based strategy game! Connect moon phases to claim tiles and score points. Both players can take each other's tiles by creating pairs or cycles. Each captured tile adds to your score. Dive into celestial strategy and compete to outsmart your opponent!
instructions: Tap or click on a moon phase card and then place it on a blank tile, or drag the card directly to the tile. Match cards to form pairs or cycles and claim the tiles for yourself!

title: Squirrel with a gun!
description: "- Ah, what a headache.... Where did the evil nut-headed bipeds come from...? What's that ?...? ? AAAAAA!" This game is about a checkered squirrel who shoots cool weapons and parkour through levels in slo mo. Help the squirrel defeat the evil nutheads and take away their nuts. ?? Complete the challenges and get cool prizes! ?
instructions: Wait for the right moment and tap on the screen to shoot. The squirrel under the influence of the impulse will fly in the opposite direction of the shot. Catch the moments to hit the enemy accurately

title: Flappy Rush
description: flappy rush is a simple casual game. touch to fly, hold to hover and release to fall. in this game your agility will be tested, pass obstacles and don't crash to stay alive, enjoy the music and complete levels that challenge your adrenaline
instructions: touch, press space or right click to fly hold touch to hover release touch to fall

title: Syder Hyper Drive
description: Syder Hyper Drive is stunt car game, based on futuristic theme. Perform different stunts from varieties of available vehicles, complete missions in this endless game.
instructions: PC: -Use the right and left arrow keys to control the car -Use the space button to jump Mobile: -Use On Screen Controls

title: Level Up Mutants
description: Level Up Mutants: An Awesome Casual Game.Discover the fun of training monsters in Level Up Mutants, the most addictive casual game ever! Combine different monsters to create dinosaurs and other powerful creatures. Level up your mutants and challenge your opponents. Test your hand speed and strategy skills. Can you become the best monster designer? Try Level Up Mutants now and have fun!
instructions: Slide to play

title: Zumba Quest
description: Explore a vibrant world with never-ending puzzles and diverse environments in each chapter. Push your limits with exciting timed challenges with special types of marbles to help you along the way. Unlock new marble shooters as you advance through exciting levels.
instructions: The game features endless marble-matching challenges. Aim and shoot to connect three or more marbles of the same color to blast them away. The goal is to match all marbles that appear or complete levels within a time limit. You can use 3 boosters to progress faster through the chapters.

title: Merge the Coins USSR!
description: ● Game in an unusual setting! Compete with friends and colleagues?! In the game you have a playing area? where coins fall and are connected if they are the same! Connect as many coins as possible to make the biggest one, save up points?! Be the first on the leaderboard?! Play and relax ?!
instructions: 1. At first it will be easy to connect the coins, but over time there will be more and more of them. Once you match the biggest coin in this game, it will disappear? and give you the most points?! If one of the coins touches the line and lies on it for some time, then you will lose?, and the game will start again?! 2. Press and hold your finger or mouse to control the coin. Release your finger or mouse button to make the coin fall onto the field?! 3. Enjoy the game?!

title: Magic Tri Peaks Solitaire
description: Magic Tri Peaks Solitaire is the classic one lower one higher solitaire you know and love. It sounds easy: just remove cards from the board one higher or lower than the next card in the deck. But there's a whole other world behind these simple rules! The constantly changing locations and new cards on the board will keep you on your toes using new strategies. Don't expect to be an expert if you don't play for a couple weeks!
instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI.

title: Lumber Factory Simulator
description: Welcome to "Lumber Mill Simulator"! This is an exciting game where you own a sawmill. Your success depends on your ability to make informed decisions, effectively manage resources and grow your business. Are you ready to become a great lumber tycoon?
instructions: 1. Tree Processing: You can process trees into various types of products such as wood and furniture. 2. Selling Products: Earn money by selling your products in the market. Satisfy customer needs and increase your profits. 3. Factory Expansion: Gradually expand your factory by adding new equipment and improving production processes. 4. Character Upgrade: Develop your character's skills to become a successful entrepreneur in the forestry industry.

title: Hydraulic Press 2D ASMR
description: You have in your hands a terrifying power that gives you the ability to grind dozens of objects! A very effective stress reliever. Try out your personal hydraulic press right now and start destroying all objects! Crush, crush, break!
instructions: ?Is it pleasant to operate a powerful hydraulic press?? What happens to a watermelon if you crush it? You have in your hands a terrifying power? that gives you the ability to grind? dozens of objects! Very effective stress reliever. You can crush and destroy: ? bottles ? corn ? watermelons ? cars ? alarm clocks ? pumpkins and much more! The more you crush, the more crushing power you can pump out of the hydraulic press!

title: Giant Run 3D
description: Giant Run 3D is a boy's free online game. You need to choose the correct doors to gather more people. The more people you collect, the bigger the giant you can merge at the end and the chances of winning will be enlarged. The game will eventually require your people to become a giant so that you can fight to the death with the final boss. Sprint all the way to the finish line to start fighting!
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: ASMR Water vs Fire
description: Water vs Fire, upgrade your water power and damp down the fire! And Have fun! Upgrade your Water Power and your Amount of Canister. - Easy intuitive controls - Release to shoot
instructions: release to shoot

title: Stack Blocks Connect Wooden Blocks!
description: ● This is a game in which you have to connect wooden blocks?! Compete with friends and colleagues?! In the game you have a playing area? where you must connect blocks to fill the line! Once the line is full, the blocks will disappear and give you the most points?! Compete with friends or colleagues on the leaderboard?! Enjoy your game?!
instructions: 1. At first it will be easy to connect the blocks, but over time there will be more and more of them. Combine wisely so that you have room left ?! 2. Press and hold your finger or mouse to control the block. Release your finger or mouse button to let the block fall onto the field?! 3. Enjoy the game?!

title: Bed Wars
description: Take on the role of a commander, control your squad of stickmen, upgrade your soldiers, upgrade your base defense, get resources, fight on the battlefield with other players and capture enemy bases. And the enemy bases are their beds. The game has many levels. With each level, the base becomes more and more difficult to defend, and opponents become more aggressive and powerful. Will you be able to maintain your position as a Leader and defeat everyone?
instructions: The goal of the game is to capture and destroy all enemy beds while keeping your own bed. Control on a mobile device: touch / swipe. Control on desktop: left mouse button.

title: Graffiti Tags: spray painting
description: Become a graffiti master in our simulator! Realistic physics, a wide range of colors and surfaces. Draw on the walls, avoid the police and create unique masterpieces of street art. Your path will not be easy — the police will pursue you at every step. But if you avoid them, your works can become a real cultural heritage! Get inspired, develop your skills, experiment with colors and fonts to create unforgettable graffiti.
instructions: The goal of the game is to become the best street artist, creating unique graffiti on various surfaces, avoiding the police and developing your skills to conquer new cities. Controls on a mobile device: touch / swipe. Controls on a desktop: left mouse button.

title: Tricky Shots
description: This game is about you trying to make the best possible shot. Click and or tap on the marble to begin the aim and drag back for power. Release to shoot.
instructions: Click or tap and hold on the marble to drag and aim, then let go to shoot.

title: Merge Drop
description: Buy and merge balls. Drop them to break the cubes. Every ball will multiply when they touch the cubes. If your balls can reach the end of the level you win.
instructions: Buy and merge balls. Drop them to break the cubes. Every ball will multiply when they touch the cubes. If your balls can reach the end of the level you win.

title: The Earth Evolution
description: The Earth: Evolution is a relaxing placement game. What does your fantasy planet look like? You can use beautiful objects to decorate and build your unique planet in different areas of the universe. Collect sunlight by placing buildings and when you have enough sunlight, you get more resources needed to build your planet. Escape from the stressful daily life for a few minutes or even longer!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Block Blast Puzzle Master
description: Drop the blocks to create vertically or horizontally lines of blocks without gaps. When such a line is created, it gets destroyed. Keep your board clear and keep your cool as things heat up in this simple but addictive puzzle game! Simple but addictive puzzle game! "Block Puzzle" is a fun and classic block game! And our Block Puzzle is not just that. It is more Simple and addictive! Once you start, you will not stop playing. Just have a try, you will love it!
instructions: control by touch control by mouse
